name: Cozy Coffee
description:
IF YOU ARE ON WINDOWS PLEASE PLAY THE GAME BORDERED as visual bugs can otherwise arise.

- A, D to Move

- Collect Coffee, Avoid Leaves (in cup)

- Buy Upgrades

Made in 3 days for Cozy Fall Jam 2022 (first game and game jam ever). Graphics can be bugged (sorry :P). No WebGL version as Unity wouldn't let me.
